meanings.definition: A group of nine carbon atoms in a linear arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of nonyls in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The nonyls in the chemical formula play a crucial role in its properties.
meanings.sent3: The nonyls decided to line up in a straight row for the carbon atom parade.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, nonyls are like a chain of tiny carbon soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The nonyls stood out in the compound, forming a clear and orderly line.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or derived from nonyl alcohol.
meanings.sent1: Her perfume had a subtle hint of nonyls, giving it a unique scent.
meanings.sent2: The nonyls compound was used in the production of the new cleaning solution.
meanings.sent3: The nonyls-infused lotion made her skin feel smooth and refreshed.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the fragrance of nonyls, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The nonyls-based product was known for its long-lasting effects on surfaces.

meanings.definition: A compound containing a nonyl group.
meanings.sent1: The chemist identified the nonyls in the complex compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The nonyls group in the substance contributed to its overall structure.
meanings.sent3: The nonyls in the mixture seemed to be having a party, bonding with other elements.
meanings.sent4: The nonyls group acted as a key player in the chemical reactions of the compound.
meanings.sent5: The nonyls compound stood out due to its distinct nonyl group.
